page.title: 19LIVING IN SHERBORNE
page.content: Sherborne is a quiet place.It hasn't got much traffic,but is mainly fields and farms.I like it because of its quietness and natural beauty.One of the dislikes is there is only one shop.You always have to go to towns to buy things.It's a long village.There are old lanes leading to the farms and there are a lot of hills and animals. There are good views all around.In the valley is the Sherborne brook which has lots of fish. Most of the houses are made of Cotswold stone.There are no activity rooms,and there are very few things like you get in towns,but there are lots of woods and flowers. Sherborne is a small place.There are not many people living here.I like living in Sherborne.
